title: BUNN® My Café® MCU: How It Works
description:
BUNN® My Café® is a convenient single cup brewer that gives you the ultimate brewing flexibility.   You can brew K-Cup® packs , ground coffee, soft  pods, tea bags and loose tea using My Café.   This video provides an overview on the features of BUNN My Café MCU.  For more information visit http://www.bunnathome.com/products/single-serve/my-cafe-mcu. 


K-Cup® is a registered trademark of Keurig, Incorporated. BUNN is not affiliated with Keurig, Incorporated.
